verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* in the \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* by \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \add near\add* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Command|strong="H6680"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that they \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* of the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of their \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* to dwell \w in|strong="H3427"\w*; and ye shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add also\add* unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w* for the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* them.

And the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* shall they have to dwell \w in|strong="H3427"\w*; and the \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w* of them shall be for their \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, and for their \w goods|strong="H7399"\w*, and for all their \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w*.

And the \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w* of the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, which ye shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \add shall reach\add* from the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* and \w outward|strong="H2351"\w* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

And ye shall \w measure|strong="H4058"\w* from \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* on the \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and on the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and on the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and on the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*; and the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \add shall be\add* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w*: this shall be to them the \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w* of the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

And among the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* which ye shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \add there shall be\add* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* for \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w*, which ye shall \w appoint|strong="H5414"\w* for the \w manslayer|strong="H7523"\w*, that he may \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* thither: and to them ye shall \w add|strong="H5414"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.\f + \fr 35.6 \ft to them…: Heb. above them ye shall give\f*

\add So\add* all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* which ye shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \add shall be\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*: them \add shall ye give\add* with their \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*.

And the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* which ye shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add shall be\add* of the \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: from \add them that have\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* ye shall give \w many|strong="H7235"\w*; but from \add them that have\add* \w few|strong="H4592"\w* ye shall give \w few|strong="H4591"\w*: every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* of his \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w according|strong="H6310"\w* to his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* which he \w inheriteth|strong="H5157"\w*.\f + \fr 35.8 \ft he…: Heb. they inherit\f*
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, When ye be come \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*;

Then ye shall \w appoint|strong="H7136"\w* you \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* to be \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w* for you; that the \w slayer|strong="H7523"\w* may \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* thither, which \w killeth|strong="H5221"\w* any \w person|strong="H5315"\w* at \w unawares|strong="H7684"\w*.\f + \fr 35.11 \ft at…: Heb. by error\f*

And they shall be unto you \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* for \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w* from the \w avenger|strong="H1350"\w*; that the \w manslayer|strong="H7523"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* not, until he \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* in \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.
And of these \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* which ye shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* shall ye have for \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w*.

Ye shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* shall ye \w give|strong="H5414"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, \add which\add* shall be \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w*.

These \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* shall be a \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w*, \add both\add* for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and for the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, and for the \w sojourner|strong="H8453"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them: that every one that \w killeth|strong="H5221"\w* any \w person|strong="H5315"\w* \w unawares|strong="H7684"\w* may \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* thither.

And if he \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* him with an \w instrument|strong="H3627"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, so that he \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, he \add is\add* a \w murderer|strong="H7523"\w*: the \w murderer|strong="H7523"\w* shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

And if he \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* him with \w throwing|strong="H3027"\w* a \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, wherewith he may \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, and he \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, he \add is\add* a \w murderer|strong="H7523"\w*: the \w murderer|strong="H7523"\w* shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.\f + \fr 35.17 \ft with…: Heb. with a stone of the hand\f*

Or \add if\add* he \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* him with an \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w weapon|strong="H3627"\w* of \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, wherewith he may \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, and he \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, he \add is\add* a \w murderer|strong="H7523"\w*: the \w murderer|strong="H7523"\w* shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

The \w revenger|strong="H1350"\w* of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* himself shall \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* the \w murderer|strong="H7523"\w*: when he \w meeteth|strong="H6293"\w* him, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* shall \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* him.
But if he \w thrust|strong="H1920"\w* him of \w hatred|strong="H8135"\w*, or \w hurl|strong="H7993"\w* at him by laying of \w wait|strong="H6660"\w*, that he \w die|strong="H4191"\w*;

Or in \w enmity|strong="H0342"\w* \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* him with his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, that he \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: he that \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \add him\add* shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*; \add for\add* he \add is\add* a \w murderer|strong="H7523"\w*: the \w revenger|strong="H1350"\w* of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* shall \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* the \w murderer|strong="H7523"\w*, when he \w meeteth|strong="H6293"\w* him.

But if he \w thrust|strong="H1920"\w* him \w suddenly|strong="H6621"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w enmity|strong="H0342"\w*, or have \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* upon him any \w thing|strong="H3627"\w* without laying of \w wait|strong="H6660"\w*,

Or with any \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, wherewith a man may \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \add him\add* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \add it\add* upon him, that he \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, and \add was\add* not his \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, neither \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* his \w harm|strong="H7451"\w*:

Then the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* shall \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* between the \w slayer|strong="H5221"\w* and the \w revenger|strong="H1350"\w* of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* according to these \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*:

And the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* shall \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* the \w slayer|strong="H7523"\w* out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w revenger|strong="H1350"\w* of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* shall \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* him to the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of his \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w*, whither he was \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*: and he shall \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* in it unto the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, which was \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* with the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.

But if the \w slayer|strong="H7523"\w* shall at any \w time|strong="H3318"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* without the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of his \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w*, whither he was \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*;

And the \w revenger|strong="H1350"\w* of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* him \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of his \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w*, and the \w revenger|strong="H1350"\w* of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w kill|strong="H7523"\w* the \w slayer|strong="H7523"\w*; he shall not be guilty of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*:\f + \fr 35.27 \ft he…: Heb. no blood shall be to him\f*

Because he should have \w remained|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of his \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w* until the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*: but \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* the \w slayer|strong="H7523"\w* shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of his \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*.

So these \add things\add* shall be for a \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* unto you throughout your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* in all your \w dwellings|strong="H4186"\w*.

Whoso \w killeth|strong="H5221"\w* any \w person|strong="H5315"\w*, the \w murderer|strong="H7523"\w* shall be put to \w death|strong="H7523"\w* by the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*: but \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* shall not \w testify|strong="H6030"\w* against any \w person|strong="H5315"\w* \add to cause him\add* to \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

Moreover ye shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* no \w satisfaction|strong="H3724"\w* for the \w life|strong="H5315"\w* of a \w murderer|strong="H7523"\w*, which \add is\add* \w guilty|strong="H7563"\w* of \w death|strong="H4191"\w*: but he shall be \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.\f + \fr 35.31 \ft guilty…: Heb. faulty to die\f*

And ye shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* no \w satisfaction|strong="H3724"\w* for him that is \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* to the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of his \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w*, that he should come \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, until the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

So ye shall not \w pollute|strong="H2610"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* wherein ye \add are:\add* for \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* it \w defileth|strong="H2610"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* cannot be \w cleansed|strong="H3722"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* that is \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* therein, but by the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of him that \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* it.\f + \fr 35.33 \ft the land cannot…: Heb. there can be no expiation for the land\f*

\w Defile|strong="H2930"\w* not therefore the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which ye shall \w inhabit|strong="H3427"\w*, \w wherein|strong="H8432"\w* I \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w*: for I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
